reviews.text:
Took my dad there for a long weekend for his 60th. Had a fantastic time! Staff were kind enough to upgrade our room and everyone we spoke to was accommodating and pleasant. The facilities like gym and sauna were very good and clean. Decent selection for breakfast.

Situated in a good location and everything was within walking distance. I would recommend it and I would stay here again.

Wow, what a wonderful place! The staff was so sweet and helpful, our room was very comfortable with a gorgeous view of the nearby park, and the breakfast was probably one of the best hotel breakfasts I’ve had! We were with a baby and felt really looked after by the sweet staff. The location was also incredible, central, walking distance from old town, museums, parks etc. Can’t wait to come back!
Never did I equate small with cozy until I stayed here. The bed was very comfortable, the room was cute, with a patio, and right in the middle of the city. I loved it!

Good location, pretty central. Polite staff.  My room had a smell to it which was unpleasant. We also found long tailed silverfish which we didn't wanna take home. We couldn't unpack when we got home and had to wash and freeze stuff to make sure we didn't bring it into the house. All in all, i wouldn't stay there again.

Disapointing and overpriced "Hotel" in good location.

- The room I was staying in was in bad condition. A deep clean is needed, in the bathroom especially. The sheets where also in bad condition, one blanket cover had a clearly visible hole. You get only one middle sized towel in the room.
- Upon check-in I agreed to have my room cleaned every other day, as they want to be "green". However I didnt get any cleaning services or fresh towels until I requested it to be done at the reception on day 3! Then housekeeping defaulted back to every day.
- House keeping staff was taking breaks sitting on the floor of the hallway.
-You have to book a 30 min breakfast slot the day before. Not ideal when you want to sleep in and enjoy a relaxed breakfast!

+ The location is good, you can walk almost everywhere or take the Metro not to far away.
+Nice staff at the reception and breakfast service.
